item.title: Contact
item.description: The quickest way to reach me would be to tweet @podrezo. I am also on LinkedIn. If you need to send me confidential information, you can use PGP. My PGP Fingerprint is c6c104e85a8e10d53864feb62409464983b10004 (primary) and 93de90eb7fd5074c30ffe374a5ab445a00f9b00a (secondary).   Download my primary public key

item.title: Jira Connector for Google Data Studio
item.description: This community connector enables Google Data Studio to crunch Kanban-type statistics like lead time directly from Jira’s API.
